tabs.title: Introduction
tabs.content:
“Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.”

â€• Carl Sagan


Learn. Fun. Quiz. Repeat .
k! SciTech is back this year after the phenomenal success of the previous years. This time we are taking this quiz to new height, and yes, as Carl Sagan said, incredible things are waiting for you here!

Are you an ardent follower of Tech? Excited about science and everything it encompasses? Curious to learn new things?

Look no further. Come and join this battle of brains.

tabs.title: Rules and Format
tabs.content:
» The quiz will be held in two parts – Prelims and Finals

» Top eight teams in the Prelims qualify for the finals.

» The final top three teams get cash prizes

» A maximum of three members per team will be allowed.

» The quiz is open to all college students who are doing UG/Masters.  Cross-college teams are allowed.

» The domain of the questions will range from hard core tech to the fun and interesting scientific phenomena that happens around you.
